About the creators and contributors
There are many people who contributed to this wonderful project. This page is dedicated to giving credit to them all for the building of TCS.




check out what we have!

Our creators

TransparenCS’ creation was motivated by the experiences and continual work of its core team. Here you can see the masterminds behind TransparenCS.

Our contributors

Much of our beginner’s guide content could not have been done without the important work of our amazing writers from the CS community!


SHE/HER

Evelin Buestan

Evelin is a current first-year who is interested in computer science and excited to continue exploring the field. She also loves to showcase her lovebird and turtle from back home!

SHE/HER

Grace Fang

Grace is a senior majoring in Political Science with a focus in environmental policy. She is passionate about food justice, and is interested in seeing how computing can support food system reforms.

SHE/HER

Malahim Tariq

Malahim is a CS and Philosophy major, who likes to take long walks around campus. She is passionate about creating space for minority students and students who are new to CS. Feel free to reach out!

Ranyeli Frias

Ranyeli Frias is a first year student. She's interested in majoring in Computer Science and loves web development. In her free time, she loves dancing bachata or rewatching her favorite movies in her room with friends.

SHE/HER

Maria Vitoria Moura Cabrera

Maria is a class of 2025 International FGLI Student from Brazil double majoring in Physics and in Computer Science. She enjoys traveling and learning new languages, either real or programming!

Contact Us


This site is only possible through the efforts of students and educators like you. If you have a resource you think could be added to the page, an idea for a page on TransparenCS, or any critiques, suggestions, funny memes, questions, or poems, please contact us!
